snippet.title: Top 20 Most Shocking Grammys Snubs
snippet.description:
The Recording Academy has made some questionable decisions over the years... Join us as we count down the most iconic artists who've been slighted by the Grammys! From legendary rock bands that never won a competitive award to contemporary stars overlooked for their best work, these snubs have left music fans scratching their heads for decades. Our countdown includes Queen, Led Zeppelin, Nirvana, The Weeknd, Beyoncé, Bob Marley, Diana Ross, Tupac Shakur, Kendrick Lamar, ABBA and more! Despite their massive influence and critical acclaim, these artists were either ignored completely or recognized far too late. Have any of your favorite artists ever been snubbed by the Grammys? Let us know in the comments below!
